title: Bard
body: So im having an augment with my brother about the usefulness of Bard. I happen to think even after all the buffs he is still one of the most useless, unreliable champions that Riot has ever released while my brother thinks hes great. Was just wondering want everyone else thinks of him

replies.body: He is a great champ imo.

He is great when the team is ahead and can be extremely annoying.

When the team is behind is "playmaking style" becomes kind of useless and he isn't that great. But you can say that about a lot of champions.

If you know how to play in lane and when to roam, he is great.
Amazing champion which not many people understand.
